p: Results obtained from the screening of the interaction of the essential oils with cholinesterase from pooled human serum are presented in Table 3. Essential oils from the leaves and rhizomes of P. hybridus subsp. ochroleucus inhibited cholinesterase activity, but to a lesser extent then Neositgmin bromide, a synthetic cholinesterase inhibitor. The inhibition by the leavesâ€™ essential oil (33.24%) was lower than the inhibition by the essential oil from the rhizomes (26.37%).
